info.description:
show the intensity field of a dipolar emission of  phase-opposed emitters.
( 2D slice of the 3D field ).
mouse controls distance between the emitters.
info.name: +- dipolar emission

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2   R = iResolution.xy,
           P = ( 2.*u - R ) / R.y;            // normalized coordinates
    float  f = 10., 
           a = iMouse.z > 0.                  // distance between emitters
                 ? .3*iMouse.x/R.x            //     mouse control
                 : .15+.15*cos(iTime),        //     demo mode
           t = 10.*iTime,
          d1 = length( P - vec2(a,0) ),       // distance from P to right emitter
          d2 = length( P + vec2(a,0) );       // distance from P to left emitter
    O = (  sin( 6.28*f*d1 - t ) / (d1*d1)     // right wave
         - sin( 6.28*f*d2 - t ) / (d2*d2)     // left wave
         )
        * .2* vec4(-1,1,0,0);                 // coloring ( red: negative green: positive ) 
   // O *= O;
}
renderpass.name: Image
